segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, her hand outstretched like she’s begging for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows how dangerous this is for her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear her saying, ‘Please, just one more!’
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the girl because she’s going to be disappointed if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get what they want without anyone getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just making everything worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
